body: I agree with sirflim. How is this NTR? The idiot broke up with her after what looks like a fight, hence she's single. She willing goes with him. And actively does what he says and at the end seems perfectly happy. No NTR.
Guro and amputation not as cruel as it is ...

How is this NTR? The boyfriend is a fucking retard who literally broke up with her via text of all things, and then has the gall to regret it almost immediately. If he did that, I can only imagine he tried to confess to someone else and got rejected. I mean seriously who else does that and rebounds so fucking quickly. Girl is surely a closet slut regardless if she's willing to suck an old man's dick like it's the most delicious candy, but no one really "lost" anything here"

Can I kill this fucking old man? Like please? Pleaseeeeee?
I wanna hear his screaming so bad, and my dick will only erect after i'd fucking chop his head off :'(
This is sad. I didnt even touched my penis.
